member.name: ID2D1SourceTransform.Draw
member.summary: Draws the transform to the graphics processing unit (GPU)–based Direct2D pipeline.
member.param: The target to which the transform should be written.
The area within the source from which the image should be drawn.
The origin within the target bitmap to which the source data should be drawn.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If it fails, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID2D1SourceTransform.SetRenderInfo
member.summary: Sets the render information for the transform.
member.param: The interface supplied to the transform to allow specifying the CPU based transform pass.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If it fails, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID2D1SourceTransform
member.summary: Represents a CPU-based rasterization stage in the transform pipeline graph.
